text: "You're the One" is a single from The Black Keys, from their album Magic Potion. It was released February 26, 2007 as a download. ==Track listing== # "You're the One" # "The Way I Feel When I'm With You" (outtake) # "Work Me" (Live at The Avalon in Boston, November 16, 2005.) ==Personnel== *Patrick Carney - drums, producer *Dan Auerbach - guitars, vocals ==References== ==External links== * Category:The Black Keys songs Category:2007 songs Category:Songs written by Dan Auerbach Category:Songs written by Patrick Carney Category:2007 singles Category:V2 Records singles
title: You're the One (The Black Keys song)
